item.title: Aviation
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml gin
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 5ml crème de violette
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients (crème de violette optional).
  2. Serve in cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with cocktail cherry.

item.title: Corpse reviver no. 2
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml gin
  • 20 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Lillet Blanc
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 4 dashes absinthe
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe.
  2. Shake ingredients.
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

item.title: Gin and tonic
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 90 ml tonic water
  • (garnish) lime or lemon wedge

Instructions

  1. Build in highball glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with lime or lemon wedge.

item.title: Hanky panky
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml gin
  • 45 ml sweet vermouth
  • 2 dashes Fernet Branca
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a orange twist.

item.title: Jasmine
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml gin
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Campari
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.

item.title: Martinez
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml gin
  • 45 ml sweet vermouth
  • 5 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Stirred over ice.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Martini
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml dry vermouth
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) lemon twist
  • (garnish) olives

Instructions

  1. Make sure the drink and glass are cold.
  2. Stir ingredients.
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.

item.title: Negroni
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml gin
  • 30 ml Campari
  • 30 ml sweet vermouth
  • (garnish) slice orange

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in rocks glass over ice.
  3. Garnish with orange slice.

item.title: Southside
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1 mint sprig
  • (garnish) 1 mint leaf

Instructions

  1. Shaken (without mint).
  2. Rolled (with mint).
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with mint leaf.

item.title: Tom Collins
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • soda water
  • (garnish) lemon slice

Instructions

  1. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass and stir to combine.
  2. Add soda water to halfway up glass.
  3. Fill glass with ice.
  4. Garnish with lemon slice.
